May I have some water?

May I have the bill.

Hold the knife with your right hand.

text_en: My napkin fell on the floor. May I get another one, please?

word_vn: Bộ dụng cụ ăn (dao, nĩa, muỗng)
text_en: They brought us the food, but no cutlery! We can't eat without cutlery!
The pasta was delicious!. My compliments to the chef!
There are so many delicious entrées on this menu, I'm not sure what to have.
Let's order an appetizer as we wait for the main dish.

word_vn: Chủ đề?Khu vực: Tại quầy lễ tân

text_en: Hello, I booked a room in this hotel.
I would like a room, please.

I think I may have packed too much luggage for this trip.

word_vn: Chi phí cất giữ hành lý???

text_en: Excuse me, can you tell me what the house special is?

There is a happy hour in this bar tonight. 20% off on all drinks!
My head hurts.
I don't feel well. I feel sick.
My blood group is A positive.

text_en: I have a sore throat. I better make myself a cup of tea.
Do we have any flu medicine?

Diarrhea can cause dehydration. Make sure you drink plenty of water.

I need some headache pills.

text_en: I need a cream for this rash.
